parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Number of columns in the pixel map

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Number of rows in the pixel map

title: ISketchPicture.GetPixelmapSize
description: Gets the size of the array for the picture pixels.
signature:
System.Int32 GetPixelmapSize( 
   out System.Int32
Width
,
   out System.Int32
Height
)

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Number of columns in the pixel map

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Number of rows in the pixel map

returns: Size of the array of the picture pixels
remarks:
Call this method before calling
ISketchPicture::IGetPixelmap
to get the size of the array for that method.
